column4: I have an image file (jpeg) and I want to print it to be a specific physical size on the paper.  I'm having trouble finding out how to do that, most instructions seem to be abount setting the paper size, not the image size.  Any ideas?
use a tool like inkscape to import and scale
or hell, you can even use openoffice
Ah ok, openoffice can probably do it.  Thanks.
